text: Amphidromus bernardfamyi is a species of air-breathing tree snail, an arboreal gastropod mollusk of the family Camaenidae. == Habitat == Amphidromus bernardfamyi is usually found in an arboreal habitat. == Distribution == The distribution of Amphidromus bernardfamyi is restricted to the Sermata Islands, part of Maluku province, Indonesia. == Etymology == This species is named after the Frenchman Bernard Famy, who identified the species type. == References == bernardfamyi Category:Gastropods described in 2017 Category:Fauna of Indonesia
title: Amphidromus bernardfamyi
